column2: "Soy Organizadora de Eventos, me gusta relacionarme con las personas y conocer gente nueva.\nSiempre que puedo me organizo algún viaje. Disfruto de conocer nuevas culturas y en especial su gastronomía. Los destinos de climas cálidos y playa son los que en general más me gusta visitar.\nAsí como me gusta viajar y sentirme bien recibida como extranjera, también me gusta recibir viajeros y hacerlos sentir como en su casa durante su estadía en mi país, del cual me siento muy orgullosa. "

"Hi! My name is Luciano. I was born and raised in Patagonia, came to study in this unique city many years ago. I’ve also lived abroad (Amsterdam) and traveled a bunch —which is never enough—: needless to say…I love to walk the earth.  
I have many passions: sports —running, hiking, tennis, biking and, of course, soccer—; languages, art, music, literature and cinema. I have friends from different countries and I enjoy hosting and showing them around, as I do with our guests whenever I have the chance.  My family and I offer several apartments in the best parts of town. We have been renting them for about 18 years! We were one of the first ones in BA to join Airbnb back in 2010. It has been an amazing experience to be part of this community, and we have had the chance to welcome visitors from all over the globe.

Let me know if I can help you with your plans in la Reina del Plata, you are going to love Buenos Aires..."

"I am Luba, I  live by myself  and I rent rooms to guests from around the world. I have 2 children, Lara and Alexis. Lara lives in Buenos Aires and Alexis in Madrid. About my favorite activities, I like to dance Tango, I am keen on computers, specially about reading news on it, and I also like to chat, eat chocolates, drink coffee, go to restaurants, go to the movies and, travel (whenever I can). I also like to go shopping for clothes and shoes (whenever I can too!)."

"Vivo en Palermo Hollywood hace mas de 20 años y estoy en el negocio del Real State y B&B desde hace 10 años administrando propiedades destinadas al alquiler temporario.\nConozco muy bien el barrio y siempre dispuesta a recomendar los lugares que me gustan."
